__e: Mindful of this fact, I ask you once more, is the evidence that you have given the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth?
Have you ever in your life had a worse deposition?
I don't think the statement I gave to the police was right.
Your Honor, there's enough in this affidavit to grant us a warrant.
No not yet, but I-I need to get a statement from him, see what he remembers. Okay.
But then I've gotta do his depo upstairs.
This deposition today-- if it doesn't go better than last week...
In the deposition yesterday when you were-- you know, when you were talking about not--

- May I read my client's statement?
With all due respect, this is my deposition and you're required to answer.
The whole point of a witness statement is to tell the whole truth to the police, isn't it?
